scripts.triggerAllTests-webdriveruni-dashboard: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/webdriver-uni/* --record --key c8f5f131-5b43-4c63-9745-3c438c9eacfc --parallel --browser chrome --headed
scripts.triggerAllTests-AutoTestStore-dashboard: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/automation-test-store/* --record --key c8f5f131-5b43-4c63-9745-3c438c9eacfc --parallel --browser chrome --headed
scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress-regression-pack: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run triggerAllTests-webdriveruni && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-multi-browser: npm run triggerAllTests-AutoTestStore -- --browser electron --headed & npm run triggerAllTests-AutoTestStore -- --browser edge --headed
